title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 21 ยง 1150.4 - Effect of partial invalidity
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 21 ยง 1150.4 - Effect of partial invalidity

State Regulations

If any provision of the rules and regulations set forth in
this Chapter or the application thereof to any person or circumstance is held
invalid, such invalidity shall not affect any other provision or application of
such rules and regulations which can be given effect without the invalid
provision or application, and to this end the provisions of such rules and
regulations are declared severable. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes
R. & Regs. Tit. 21
ยง
1150.4

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
